name: getSkooled
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK Jam 2021.

The game is an infinite runner where you "control" a school of fish. avoid the dangers of the ocean while recruiting more fish to your school. dispose of your aquatic foes by sacrificing your fellow fish! (No animals were harmed in the making of this game!)

Left click - Move your school to target

Right click - Fire a kamikaze fish to destroy your enemies and earn points, but don't lose all you fish!

You gain points every second, for every fish in school, and for every foe you relinquish.

Art , Game Design, Code by Piranha305
Music by Thinkroot Records (8-bit brave adventure 4-pack)
SFX by CactusBear (8-bit tunes 8-pack)
